Class bbmain

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbmain

  • public class bbmain
extends java.lang.Object

    Bank Application

    The BankApplication allows a particular bank to manage the accout of its n customer's where they can create new accounts, close a exisiting account and even manage accounts like deposit and withdrawal
    Since:
    2018-12-05

      static void create(Bank sbi)
      This method is used to create a new account in the bank.
      static void display(Bank sbi, int pos)
      This method is to display what all the things that can be done with the customer account that is deposit, withdraw, checkdraw.
      static void login(Bank sbi)
      This method is used to login to the particular customer account.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is main method which will make use of above methods.
